content.raw: It is almost working. The main issue I have is that I am calling a script called `spawn_wamv.bash` and in that script, I am calling `gz model ...`, but i need to call it at the right timing not too early or else for some reason it crashes Gazebo. Not too late so it doesn’t start the competition too late. I am trying to use pgrep gzserver and gz topic -l | wc -l, but it is causing issues, i am not sure why
content.html: It is almost working. The main issue I have is that I am calling a script called spawn_wamv.bash and in that script, I am calling gz model ..., but i need to call it at the right timing not too early or else for some reason it crashes Gazebo. Not too late so it doesn’t start the competition too late. I am trying to use pgrep gzserver and gz topic -l | wc -l, but it is causing issues, i am not sure why
